title: Ra Zombie

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> Whenever an action is stored, it is not processed, and it is like it never happened.

> Whenever you die, all stored actions happen immediately, even if the target of the action or the user of the action is dead.

> Roleblock Immunity.

> Control Immunity.

> Redirection Immunity.

desc:
Post 2607
*Ra Zombie isn't actually named after the Sun God Ra, though that's a common mistake. He just likes to say "Ra" a lot.*
